snippet: The Secret Service has placed a high-ranking supervisor on administrative leave and suspended the employee’s security clearance after what it called “allegations of misconduct and potential criminal activity.”
abstract: High-ranking Secret Service supervisor is put on administrative leave and has security clearance suspended after agency’s Office of Professional Responsibility investigated allegations of misconduct and potential criminal activity.
lead_paragraph: The Secret Service has placed a high-ranking supervisor on administrative leave and suspended the employee’s security clearance after what it called “allegations of misconduct and potential criminal activity.”

headline.main: Secret Service Supervisor Is Put on Leave
headline.print_headline: Secret Service Supervisor Is Put on Leave
